alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 7:54PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Gulf and southeastern Bay Counties through 830 PM EDT/730 PM CDT/... At 753 PM EDT/653 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mexico Beach, or 10 miles northwest of Port St. Joe, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Port St. Joe, Mexico Beach, Tyndall Air Force Base, Highland View, White City, Overstreet, Milltown, Davis Beach, Howard Creek, Willis Landing, Beacon Hill, Dalkeith and Saint Joe Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT/700 PM CDT/ for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Gulf
